name: Bulky Splashy Bird: A Flappy Flyer Journey in Anicient City
name_original: Bulky Splashy Bird: A Flappy Flyer Journey in Anicient City
description:
Bulky Splashy Bird: A Flappy Flyer Journey in Anicient City is an arcade game developed by Salim Sazzad. It came out on 30-03-2014. Salim Sazzad published the game.
Bulky Splashy Bird: A Flappy Flyer Journey in Anicient City is available on iOS.
